## GCC Optimization

`-O0` no optimization
`-O3` all optimization (`-O1`,`-O2`) + function inlining and more

`funroll-loops`

::: {.callout-tip}
### Enabling Optimization

```c
#pragma GCC optimize ("O0")
```
